name: Super Arcade Football
description: Super Arcade Football is a fast action, modern take on the classic football genre. Play singleplayer, with up to 4 friends locally, or take the game online, with intense scorelines, dynamic gameplay and crazy fun. No real-life simulation, no micro transactions, just pure arcade football action!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or higher Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 560/Equivalent or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
